name: Samsung I9192 Galaxy S4 Mini DUOS GSM Smartphone (Unlocked), Black

reviews.name: Samsung I9192 Galaxy S4 Mini DUOS GSM Smartphone (Unlocked), Black
reviews.reviewText: The phone works as expected and is very easy to use. This is a great value at the time of purchase; much cheaper than other vendors. The model has all the perks wanted and works great as a remote control for most of my AV equipment using third party software. I am very happy with this purchase. I own (wife and kids) several S3 full size, and now the S4 mini. I would buy it again.
reviews.title: Excellent Value at the time of purchase

reviews.name: Samsung I9192 Galaxy S4 Mini DUOS GSM Smartphone (Unlocked), Black
reviews.reviewText: I have tried to get a on line instruction book but I'm not able to find one . I know it saves the seller money but it really hinders the getting to know your phone and prevents me from getting the most out of the phone. The phone works well for the things I have figured out on my own or had someone show me
reviews.title: not havine a instruction book really stinks

reviews.name: Samsung I9192 Galaxy S4 Mini DUOS GSM Smartphone (Unlocked), Black
reviews.reviewText: Great phone. Very smooth OS and a great size. Fast and reliable.
reviews.title: Awesome device!
